Address.label: Address
Address.value: 20 SOUTH BROAD STREET, CANFIELD, Ohio, 44406, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Farmers National Banc Corp operates in the domestic banking, trust, retirement consulting, insurance and financial management industries. Its business consists of owning and supervising its subsidiaries. Farmers' business activities are primarily aggregated in two lines of business, the Bank segment and Farmers Trust segment. The company operates only in the United States. It has its operations in Mahoning, Trumbull, Columbiana, Stark, Wayne, Medina, and Cuyahoga Counties in Ohio, and Beaver County in Pennsylvania.
